section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This chapter shall apply 180 days after February 22, 2019.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of Subtitle II-B of this title, see title I of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-110, July 31, 2019, 66 DCR 178).

For temporary (90 days) creation of Subtitle II-B of this title, see title I of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-144, Oct. 29, 2019, 66 DCR 14331).
For temporary (225 days) creation of Subtitle II-B of this title, see title I of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Temporary Act of 2019 (D.C. Law 23-29, Nov. 26, 2019, 66 DCR 13124).
For temporary (90 days) creation of Subtitle II-B of this title, see title I of Appraisal Management Company Regulation Emergency Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-341, July 27, 2020, 67 DCR 9357).
